text: unsigned long cost ; void func ( unsigned long arr [ ] , unsigned long size ) { unsigned long count = 0 ; int i ; if ( size == 1 ) { return ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < size ; ) { if ( ( size % 2 ) != 0 && ( i + 1 ) == size ) { arr [ count ] == arr [ i ] ; } else if ( arr [ i ] > arr [ i + 1 ] ) { cost = cost + arr [ i + 1 ] ; arr [ count ] = arr [ i + 1 ] ; } else { cost = cost + arr [ i ] ; arr [ count ] = arr [ i ] ; } count ++ ; i = i + 2 ; } if ( ( count + 1 ) > 1 ) { func ( arr , count ) ; } return ; } int main ( void ) { int t , i ; unsigned long size ; unsigned long arr [ 50000 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { cost = 0 ; scanf ( "%lu" , & size ) ; int arr [ size ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < size ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%lu" , & arr [ i ] ) ; } func ( arr , size ) ; printf ( "%lu\n" , cost ) ; } return 0 ; }
